name: LegacyXperia Project
body:
### Welcome to LegacyXperia Project homepage.
LegacyXperia Project is an unofficial build of CyanogenMod 10.1 for legacy Sony Ericsson msm7x30 devices.
It is an effort to join all developer forces to bring a stable cm-10.1 rom on these devices which are dropped from official CM.

### Supported devices:
Currently only mogami devices are supported. zeus devices don't have a 3.4 kernel port yet so it's not possible to support them, no active developer has this device.

List of supported devices & links to xda support & development threads:
* Xperia Arc/Arc S [(anzu)](http://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?t=2147958)
* Live with Walkman [(coconut)](http://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?t=2227517)
* Xperia Neo V [(haida)](http://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?t=2227490)
* Xperia Neo [(hallon)](http://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?t=2227490)
* Xperia Pro [(iyokan)](http://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?t=2147958)
* Xperia Mini Pro [(mango)](http://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?t=2227517)
* Xperia Active [(satsuma)](http://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?t=2227517)
* Xperia Mini [(smultron)](http://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?t=2227517)
* Xperia Ray [(urushi)](http://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?t=2261654)

### Useful links:
* [Downloads (anzu & iyokan)](http://goo.im/devs/shufuking/CM10.1)
* [Downloads (rest of the devices)](http://goo.im/devs/mikeioannina/cm10.1)
* [Recommended Google apps](http://goo.im/gapps/gapps-jb-20130301-signed.zip)
* [Official CyanogenMod changelog](http://review.cyanogenmod.org/#/q/status:merged+branch:cm-10.1,n,z)
* [Release changelog](https://github.com/LegacyXperia/local_manifests/wiki/Changelog)
* [Status of cm-10.1 with 3.4 kernel](https://github.com/M66B/cm-xtended/wiki/CM10.1-kernel-3.4-status)
* [Bug tracker](https://github.com/M66B/cm-xtended/issues?state=open)
* [Github sources](https://github.com/LegacyXperia)
* [Petition: JB camera libs for all Sony Xperia 2011 phones.](http://www.groubal.com/jb-camera-libs-for-all-sony-xperia-2011-phones/)

### Useful guides:
* [How to fix wrong Google apps](https://github.com/M66B/cm-xtended/wiki/How-to-fix-wrong-Google-apps)
* [How to report issues](https://github.com/M66B/cm-xtended/wiki/How-to-report-issues)
* [How to get logs](https://github.com/M66B/cm-xtended/wiki/How-to-get-logs)
* [How to build yourself](http://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?t=2164696)
* [How to enable Development & Performance settings](https://github.com/M66B/cm-xtended/wiki/How-to-get-development-settings-in-CM10.1)

### FAQ:
* [Why is 720p recording disabled?](http://forum.xda-developers.com/showpost.php?p=38778850&postcount=1324)
* [Can I use another kernel?](https://plus.google.com/100275307499530023476/posts/S1c2HQJPhJU)
* [To wipe or not to wipe?](https://github.com/M66B/cm-xtended/wiki/To-wipe-or-not-to-wipe)
